# Vile Death (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Calling Spells|calling]]) \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[9th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 9]], Dread Necromancer 7, [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 20th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 20]], [[BoXM 20th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 20]]

**Casting Time:** 1 hour

**Components:** V, S, M (a bit of brimstone and a bloodstone worth at least 500 gp.), XP (100 XP)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One corporeal undead creature

**Duration:** Permanent (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Heroes of Horror (WotC)Â­, pg. 133

You summon the spirit of a fiend from the depths of Hell or the Abyss and bind it into the body of a corporeal undead creature.

Binding the fiend applies the [[Fiendish Creature (Template)|fiendish template]] to the undead creature. The resulting creature is independent of you and can act on its own. Its initial attitude toward you is indifferent.
